name: Deep into the Volcano
description:
This game was made for Ludum Dare 48

Escape from a Volcano and go throu its caves. Use your jetpack and parkour to escape from the Lava Yes there is no menu screen Yes I used a label to teach Yes thats the Godot Icon. No menu yet, sorry

Controls:

  • R to restart level
  • Z to jump
  • X to glide
  • Shift to wall grab
  • Find the giant Godot Icon to go to the next level
